name: Space Junk Scavenger
description:
(The Ludum Dare prototype of this game is available as a free download at the bottom of this page)

You wrecked your vessel in a mysterious ship graveyard near a black hole.

Salvage parts and repair your ship before your power runs out, and watch out for space monsters!

Game by Francis Coulombe, with music by cBoyardee.
twitter- @FrancisCoulombe
twitch- www.twitch.tv/frankiepixelshow

Controls:

While in spaceship:
Arrow keys for movement
C to begin Salvage operation

While in space suit:
Arrow keys for movement
X for thrusters
C to shoot
S and D cycle equipped items
number keys 0 through 9 also select items

The prototype of this game was initially made as part of Ludum Dare 39, and was developed in 72 hours! You can download that prototype for free below.
